title: SAMSUNG 220 L Direct Cool Single Door 4 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer with Digi Touch Cool, Curd Maestro + BSD  (MIDNIGHT BLOSSOM BLACK, RR23A2K3XBZ/HL)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Unit Refrigerator, User Manual with Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Product and 10 Years on Compressor From Samsung
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Curd Maestro: You can make fresh curd irrespective of the weather conditions as well as preserve it easily in this refrigerator.
product_description.Digital Inverter Technology: This technology is energy-efficient, makes less noise, and delivers a durable performance. The compressor makes adjustments in its speed automatically in accordance with the cooling demands.

review:
This is one of the best refrigerator in the market. Colour and design is awesome. Good space also vegetable box and trail quality is very good.

If in your family2-3 person love to eat curd then only curd mestro is good, because you can not make curd one small bowl curd in freeze.

Over all this is a very good performance refrigerator.

Awesome. Nice product
fast cooling nice design and space availability just awesome. Unique features curd mestro and power saving and also faster ice meking. If you want to buy single door fridge go for it blindly.

Writing reviews after one month
1.The refrigerator is awesome in design and performance
2.Not having any feel of sound that there is a refrigerator is just running nearby.
3.value for money
4.Easy to install & run. No requirement of service person to call up for demo & installation.
5.very effective in cooling and voltge consumption.
6.can it be easiy run with home inverter.
Best of luck for your turn.
I am a happy with flip kart delivering and services

Very good product in this segment 220 Litre
Design and performance are best from Samsung.
Curd maestro and Digi cool touch pad are best part of this product.
Great product 🤩.i love this at this price range.. features loaded a great product. Entire family was loved it.
FIRST IMPRESSION BEAUTIFUL PERFORMANCE IS NICE WORKS ON INVERTER ALSO OVER ALL I FOUND IT A GREAT DEAL

Very good refrigerator I like the curd that make on the box, only downsize is defrosting we did not make any ice but the frizer is fully pack with ice use to defrost it and also the different colours are not available in flipkart which was disappointed for me.
Pros-
1) led white light look good when open,
2) Curd miestro work well and make tasty curd,
3) easy to operate
4) inbuilt inveter which make it cool for long time and less noise in compressor
5)drawer which easy to store onions n potatoes
6) Very silent machine I loved it bzoz of invetor motor
Cons
1) Packaging was not good by seller be aware!!!
2) ice is collected atomatically in lower side of frizer use to defrost it manually
3) It catches finger print easily has to clean daily:
Overall the fridge is perfect and easy to use it is a very advanced fridge by samsung love it. Only one star deduct for packaging by seller and no colours option available.

Have started using the refrigerator since last 2 days , everything seems perfect and it's up to the expectation that I had from this refrigerator. And coming to it's digital controller it's freaking awesome with multiple functionality. Will take some time to write the actual review about it. But for a small family it's an outstanding good to go model.

Super product launch by samsung.. love the front design.
The front Touch pannel is also super. Overall I'm giving the 5* start.

This is one of the best refrigerator in the market. Colour and design is awesome. Good space also vegetable box and trail quality is very good.

If in your family2-3 person love to eat curd then only curd mestro is good, because you can not make curd one small bowl curd in freeze.

Over all this is a very good performance refrigerator.

First look very nice
Great performance
Very low power consumption
It's good quite nice nice design... Just I was thinking about more space....👌.....

Just go for it
Awesome performance

The product is good. Value for money. Got delivered on time.
But the installation services are pathetic. It's been more than one week the product is delivered. And while ordering the product, flipkart assured an installation service from samsung. Even the delivery partners confirmed the same. Then i contacted Flipkart, first response was why do you need an installation service for the product. I mean why not???
Then i explained why a product like refrigerator which is heavy and with touch controls need an installation service to a flipkart agent. I thought he understood. But, till now no response was received on the same.
Today I have received this product. I will give my feedback after using 1 month but the look is perfect..but samsung should give a little bit more large size with this price range.
Best refrigerator I am so happy👌Thankyou flipkart.
Awesome 👌 and thank you so much Flipkart 😊
Overall i loved the product good looks and good cooling
Osm product in this price range.
Overall it is good purchase. The only problem is excess ice formation in ice chamber.
Very good product and new system future Samsung thanks and cards Maestro LED system
Great product.. used it for more than 06 months
During frosting we need transfer water outside from the refrigerator. It makes messy now.
Fridge is very nice.. quite enough for small family of 4 people..lookwise also nice..

Super samsung singal door frige
Nice
Product is very good but delivery is very late
Awesome, Great it's very nice and superb... No words to explain... Thanks to Flipkart...
Very nice product value for money ...👌just to good but fridge quality so good 👍

I have received the product on time . Quality of product is really grate . I liked the product . Only one concern about this they have not provided stand and due small length of cable it couldn’t able to connect to switch board
this product is good. happy with the purchase.
Very good looking and good silent performance
Product is ok but defridge is water spiliting

Truely a great choice with advanced features and serviceability.A must buy for couples and small family types who wish to make their interior more beautiful along with added advantage of samsungs latest features
Best single door refrigerator in market. Just go for it.
Money worth.good working condition with excellent design
Product is super but delivery agent was camed so late at night that it product is awesome
product is best but demonstration not given.
Looking too good, even performance also...
